verses.text: Sing \w aloud|strong="H7442"\w* unto \w God|strong="H0430"\w* our \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*: make a joyful \w noise|strong="H7321"\w* unto the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.\f + \fr 81.1 \ft of Asaph: or, for Asaph\f*

\w Take|strong="H5375"\w* a \w psalm|strong="H2172"\w*, and \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* hither the \w timbrel|strong="H8596"\w*, the \w pleasant|strong="H5273"\w* \w harp|strong="H3658"\w* with the \w psaltery|strong="H5035"\w*.

Blow \w up|strong="H8628"\w* the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w* in the new \w moon|strong="H2320"\w*, in the time \w appointed|strong="H3677"\w*, on our solemn \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.
For this \add was\add* a \w statute|strong="H2706"\w* for \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add and\add* a \w law|strong="H4941"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.

This he \w ordained|strong="H7760"\w* in \w Joseph|strong="H3084"\w* \add for\add* a \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*, when he went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* through the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: \add where\add* I \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* a \w language|strong="H8193"\w* \add that\add* I \w understood|strong="H3045"\w* not.\f + \fr 81.5 \ft through: or, against\f*

I \w removed|strong="H5493"\w* his \w shoulder|strong="H7926"\w* from the \w burden|strong="H5447"\w*: his \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* were \w delivered|strong="H5674"\w* from the \w pots|strong="H1731"\w*.\f + \fr 81.6 \ft were…: Heb. passed away\f*

Thou \w calledst|strong="H7121"\w* in \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*, and I \w delivered|strong="H2502"\w* thee; I \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* thee in the secret \w place|strong="H5643"\w* of \w thunder|strong="H7482"\w*: I \w proved|strong="H0974"\w* thee at the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Meribah|strong="H4809"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.\f + \fr 81.7 \ft Meribah: or, Strife\f*
\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, O my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and I will \w testify|strong="H5749"\w* unto thee: O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, if thou wilt \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto me;
There shall no \w strange|strong="H2114"\w* \w god|strong="H0410"\w* be in thee; neither shalt thou \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* any \w strange|strong="H5236"\w* \w god|strong="H0410"\w*.

I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* thee out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: open thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w wide|strong="H7337"\w*, and I will \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* it.
But my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* would not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* to my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*; and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w would|strong="H0014"\w* none of me.

So I gave them \w up|strong="H7971"\w* unto their own \w hearts’|strong="H3820"\w* \w lust|strong="H8307"\w*: \add and\add* they \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* in their own \w counsels|strong="H4156"\w*.\f + \fr 81.12 \ft unto…: or, to the hardness of their hearts, or, imagination\f*

\w Oh|strong="H3863"\w* that my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* had \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* unto me, \add and\add* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* had \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* in my \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*!

I should \w soon|strong="H4592"\w* have \w subdued|strong="H3665"\w* their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, and \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* against their \w adversaries|strong="H6862"\w*.

The \w haters|strong="H8130"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* should have \w submitted|strong="H3584"\w* themselves unto him: but their \w time|strong="H6256"\w* should have endured for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.\f + \fr 81.15 \ft submitted…: or, yielded feigned obedience: Heb. lied\f*

He should have \w fed|strong="H0398"\w* them also with the \w finest|strong="H2459"\w* of the \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w*: and with \w honey|strong="H1706"\w* out of the \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* should I have \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w* thee.\f + \fr 81.16 \ft finest…: Heb. fat of wheat\f*
